FSLDOM

A fast, simple and lightweight library for manipulating the DOM

FSLDOM is available in three formats:

  • as an ES6 module that can be included via an import statement
  • as a CommonJS module that can include via require()
  • as an IIFE which creates a global variable

Each format is available as minified and uncompressed bundles. The minified versions are recommended for production.
